result.markdown:
---
title: "Analysis of NRFA Data"
date: "05/02/2025"
format: html
---



## Loading the data and R packages 


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library( lubridate )
library( dplyr )
```
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
Bathford_RF <- read.csv( "Bathford River Flow.csv", skip=20, header=FALSE,
                         colClasses = c("character","numeric","NULL") ) 
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning in read.table(file = file, header = header, sep = sep, quote = quote, :
cols = 2 != length(data) = 3
```


:::
:::


## Data Cleaning

Check which variables need to converted and renamed


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
glimpse( Bathford_RF )
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Rows: 19,697
Columns: 2
$ V1 <chr> "1969-10-27", "1969-10-28", "1969-10-29", "1969-10-30", "1969-10-31…
$ V2 <dbl> 3.998, 3.958, 4.210, 4.480, 4.205, 3.830, 3.723, 3.986, 4.353, 4.52…
```


:::
:::


### Change variables names


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
Bathford_RF <- rename( Bathford_RF, Date = V1, RiverFlow = V2 )
```
:::


### Convert to correct type


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
Bathford_RF$Date <- as_date( Bathford_RF$Date, format="%Y-%m-%d" )
```
:::



## Data Wrangling and visualization

### Proportion of missing data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mean( is.na( Bathford_RF$RiverFlow ) )
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 0.006244606
```


:::
:::


### Plot river flow over time


::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot( Bathford_RF$Date, Bathford_RF$RiverFlow, type='l',
      xlab="Date", ylab="River Flow", cex.lab = 1.5 )
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Analysis-NRFA-Data-for-Bathford_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){fig-align='center' width=60%}
:::
:::


### Filter observations based on date and observed river flow


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
Bathford_RF_High <- filter( Bathford_RF, RiverFlow > 100 )
slice_head( Bathford_RF_High, n=5 )
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
        Date RiverFlow
1 1970-11-19     104.3
2 1971-01-21     128.4
3 1971-01-22     114.8
4 1971-01-23     115.2
5 1971-01-24     133.1
```


:::
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
Bathford_RF_High <- filter( Bathford_RF, RiverFlow > 100, year(Date) > 1990 )
slice_head( Bathford_RF_High, n=5 )
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
        Date RiverFlow
1 1991-01-10     112.1
2 1992-11-26     106.9
3 1992-11-27     100.9
4 1992-11-28     100.6
5 1992-11-29     131.6
```


:::
:::
